title: Sony Htct180 2.1 Channel Bluetooth Sound Bar w/Subwoofer -
description: Get more out of your movies and shows when you can hear the audio in incredible quality with the Sony 2.1 Channel Bluetooth Sound Bar and Subwoofer! The sound comes alive with the 100W output, and ClearAudio+ enhancements. Connect to your TV or other devices using the Bluetooth and NFC connectivity.

title: Fluid 2.0 Channel Soundbar -
description: Get the most out of your HDTV with this 2.0-channel soundbar with its unique detachable design that delivers high performance sound that's so incredible, you'll never go back to your TV speakers again.

title: Fluid 48" 1080p DLED HDTV -
description: The Fluid 48in DLED HDTV features direct LED technology, where the LEDs are placed directly behind the display for a high contrast ratio and sharper images. This direct-LED TV also offers 1080p full HD resolution for incredible picture quality and a 60Hz refresh rate for smooth, clean visuals and movement. Be blown away by the picture quality when you are watching your favourite movies and TV shows.
